trans-unit.source: Represents an extension of an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddIn" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddIn" /> 对象的扩展。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.IAddInExtension> interface defines a set of members that extend the functionality of <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddIn> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.IAddInExtension>接口定义的一组扩展的功能的成员<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddIn>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.IAddInExtension> interface is implemented by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase> class.
This is the base class for the generated `ThisAddIn` class in application-level projects.
trans-unit.target: 这是生成基类`ThisAddIn`应用程序级项目中的类。
有关详细信息，请参阅[VSTO 外接程序编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-vsto-add-ins.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that implements the <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility</c> interface.
trans-unit.target: 返回实现 <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility</c> 接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.IRibbonExtensibility</c> interface.
For more information about this method, see <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此方法的详细信息，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.CreateRibbonExtensibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension" /> objects that represent the **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** items in the add-in to display at run time.
trans-unit.target: 返回要在运行时显示的表示加载项中“功能区（可视化设计器）”项的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension" /> objects that represent the **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** items in the add-in to display at run time.
trans-unit.target: 要在运行时显示的表示加载项中“功能区（可视化设计器）”项的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.IRibbonExtension" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this method, see <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.CreateRibbonObjects%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此方法的详细信息，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.CreateRibbonObjects%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object in the add-in that can be used by other solutions.
trans-unit.target: 返回加载项中可供其他解决方案使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object in the add-in that can be used by other solutions.
trans-unit.target: 加载项中可供其他解决方案使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this method, see <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.RequestComAddInAutomationService%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此方法的详细信息，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.RequestComAddInAutomationService%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that identifies an extensibility interface that is supported by Microsoft Office applications.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，用于标识 Microsoft Office 应用程序支持的扩展性接口。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that extends a feature in a Microsoft Office application.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个对象，该对象可扩展 Microsoft Office 应用程序中的一个功能。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the extensibility interface that is identified by <paramref name="serviceGuid" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，可实现由 <paramref name="serviceGuid" /> 标识的扩展性接口。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this method, see <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.RequestService%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此方法的详细信息，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.AddInBase.RequestService%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。
